ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the Messengers' time is appointed -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when the time comes for raising the little girls (buried alive) --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the appointed time to bring the Messengers together arrives, (then shall the promised event come to pass).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Messengers will receive their appointments.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the time of the Noble Messengers arrives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the Messengers are Uqqitat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the apostles are gathered at their appointed time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and when the Messengers' time is set,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the messengers are brought unto their time appointed -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when the messengers are brought together at the appointed time --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the apostles are collected at the appointed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and time is set for the apostles [to bear witness]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when the messengers are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the Messengers are gathered to their time appointed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and when the Messengers' time is set
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the messengers' time has come...
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:11] and when the time is set for the [testimony of the] messengers (read uqqitat or wuqqitat), that is to say, [when] they are gathered to an appointed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 718 And when the messengers are brought unto their time appointed) and when the messengers are gathered.
